Plot: A Brooklyn teenager feels his only chance to succeed is as the king of the disco floor. His carefree youth and weekend dancing help him to forget the reality of his bleak life.
Title: Saturday Night Fever
Writer: Nik Cohn (story "Tribal Rites of the New Saturday Night"), Norman Wexler (screenplay)
Actors: John Travolta, Karen Lynn Gorney, Barry Miller, Joseph Cali
tomatoConsensus: Boasting a smart, poignant story, a classic soundtrack, and a starmaking performance from John Travolta, Saturday Night Fever ranks among the finest dramas of the 1970s.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 11 nominations.
